scenes.action_text: INT. BEDROOM - NIGHT Ed lies awake in bed. He is sweaty and nervous. His eyes are wide-open, blood-shot and tired. He picks up his bedside clock which is ticking loudly. It is 3:37. He looks over at the other side of the queen-size bed. It is still made. He picks a long, blonde hair from the pillow and examines it curiously. There is a noise outside and Ed gets up to investigate. INT. HALLWAY - NIGHT Ed walks through the dark hallway and into the living room of his small house
